name: api-generation
description: Provides project for generating api from OpenAPI spec and converting from typescript to vanilla javascript.

scripts.start: npx @rtk-incubator/rtk-query-codegen-openapi --baseUrl $(grep API_ENDPOINT ../../../.env | cut -d '=' -f2) --hooks api.json > api.generated.ts && node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc api.generated.ts

author: ITKDev
